text: Lorient is a commune and seaport in the Morbihan department in Brittany. ==Sister cities== Lorient is twinned with: * Galway City, Ireland, since 1978 * Vigo, Spain * Wirral, United Kingdom * Ventspils, Latvia * Ludwigshafen, Germany * České Budějovice, Czech Republic * Denizli, Turkey Category:Communes in Morbihan Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Lorient
